File /obj/armour.c

This function is called on an object and causes it to be worn if it can be by it's environment(), i.e the player carrying it.

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /std/armour_logic.c, /std/object.c and /std/basic/wearable.c

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/virtual.h and /include/move_failures.h
